mapper.select: SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, CHASU AS chasu, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, WORK_DATE AS workDate, WORK_CONTENT AS workContent FROM ATMS_02001280

SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, CHASU AS chasu, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, WORK_DATE AS workDate, WORK_CONTENT AS workContent FROM ATMS_02001280 WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_02001280 SET CHASU = #{chasu}, JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, WORK_DATE = #{workDate}, WORK_CONTENT = #{workContent} WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_02001280 ( WORK_SEQ_NO, CHASU, JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, CORNER_NAME, WORK_DATE, WORK_CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{workSeqNo}, #{chasu}, #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{cornerName}, #{workDate}, #{workContent} )
